name: Super SpaceMail - DEMO
description:
Hello, Potential Traveler! We from BUBBLE DELIVERING ENTERPRISE made this Mini Space Experience completely for free, so you can test your skills and see if you can handle delivering super important letters around!

In case you forgot or have no idea what we’re talking about, this is a controlled testing experience with high technology robots and everything you may need to try an almost realistic space journey to see if you are well qualified for our job application.

The task here is to travel side by side with a living spaceship using all the tools we have available and a coordinated navigation system made to guide you both through the challenges and delivering the package without any trouble.

Attention (for real):

This game is super shiny and might be bad for people with certain sensibilities, please don’t apply if you have one of them.

Jokes aside, thank you a lot for coming here, It means a lot. I hope you like this demo!

No Space Animals were harmed in the production of this game.
